item.title: 'Can't pretend like I feel like this is justice': Idaho victim's dad slams plea deal
item.description: The family of University of Idaho murder victim Kaylee Goncalves is blasting the plea offered to Bryan Kohberger.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Megabill vote expected soon as Thune says he has the votes
item.description: A Senate "vote-a-rama" on President Donald Trump's megabill has now stretched more than 24 hours as Republicans are stuck amid opposition from several...

item.title: What to know about 'Alligator Alcatraz' migrant detention center amid Trump visit
item.description: Trump is visiting the new "Alligator Alcatraz" migrant detention center in Florida's Everglades on Tuesday.

item.title: WATCH: Mountain deck covered with 'lovebugs' in South Korea
item.description: Swarms of “lovebugs” are back in South Korea, blanketing a mountain peak, entering houses and sticking to car windows.

item.title: WATCH: North Korea's Kim Jong Un seen crying over soldier's coffin
item.description: North Korea's state media showed leader Kim Jong Un draping coffins with the national flag.
